title.rendered: STEDI HOLDEN COLORADO Z71 SPORTSCAT ROOF LIGHT BAR MOUNTING BRACKET

content.rendered:
Holden Colorado Z71 & HSV SportsCat Roof LED Light Bar mounts.

COMPATIBILITY

Fits our ST2K 40.5″ Light Bar.

PRERUNNER STYLING

The STEDI Roof Rail bracket to suit Holden Colorado Z71 and SportsCat, is designed to secure our ST2K 40.5″ bar between the factory roof rails. Unlike other solutions on the market, installation does not require you to drill any holes in your pillars or roof, making it 100% reversible. Compatible with all Colorado models fitted with factory roof rails.

PERFECT FIT

Our Colorado roof mounts locate at perfect proximity from the windscreen to ensure zero glare or wind noise. The height and depth have been optimised to achieve a cohesive and proportionate fit that looks aggressive while maintaining that OEM vibe.

DETAILS

Finally, a roof light bar mounting solution that doesn’t involve drilling or other intrusive fasteners. Designed and engineered specifically for the Holden Colorado Z71 & SportsCat RG , using 3mm stainless steel finished in a satin UV stable powder coating.

Designed to bolt to existing fasteners on the underside of roof railing, our Colorado roof bracket is designed to fit our ST2K 40.5″ series light bars (sold seperately) – Not that 40.5″ is the maximum width the factory rails will fit.

Whilst our Colorado brackets may suit other similar size light bars, we ask customer to take caution as we have only torture tested using the above STEDI ST2K bar only.

SPECIFICATIONS

MATERIAL 3mm Stainless Steel
FITS Holden Colorado Z71, HSV SportsCat

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • Set of Holden Colorado Z71 / SportsCat Roof Brackets
  • 4 x Stainless button head bolts
  • 4 x Stainless steel flat washers

STEDI HOLDEN COLORADO Z71 SPORTSCAT ROOF LIGHT BAR MOUNTING BRACKET

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
